headline: Assurant Board of Directors Approves Common Stock Dividend Increase of 11%
summary: ATLANTA, November 19, 2024--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a leading global business services company that supports, protects, and connects major consumer purchases, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend increase of $0.08 to $0.80 per share of common stock. The dividend will be payable on December 30, 2024 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on December 9, 2024.
